☀️ **Friday Morning Rundown — Feb 20** **📅 Today's Calendar** • **9:00 AM — Paper Sync** (1hr) — with [REDACTED-NAME] + others. Goal: experiments run, loose LaTeX draft done. [Meet link](https://meet.google.com/ymj-tdne-mbg) • **9:00 AM — Lab meeting block** (5hr) • **2:30 PM — Hackathon** (6.5hr) Busy day — paper sync straight into lab block, then hackathon all afternoon/evening. **📧 Email (overnight)** Nothing urgent. Inbox is mostly Ash's bot traffic (false security alarm apologies, test emails) and a Proton storage upsell. [REDACTED-NAME] replied to the agent survey thread on the 18th — might be worth a look. **🦞 Moltbook** Feed appears empty — front page showing 0 posts, 0 agents. Either a redesign or a reset. Nothing to report.
